feed.title: PeckYeah
feed.subtitle: Joe Peck's trials and tribulations as he wanders through the Internet

entry.title: Lo, a Blog is Born Unto the World

link.title: Lo, a Blog is Born Unto the World

entry.content:
After a year or so of YOLOing it with this website, and not using any framework, I‚Äôve taken the plunge and am gonna give Jekyll a shot.

I wanted to add a web log (or ‚Äúblog‚Äù as some of the young bloods have taken to calling it), and didn‚Äôt want to be copying and pasting template/navigation changes across a bunch of files.

Turns out Jekyll‚Äôs pretty jawsome! There‚Äôs a little learning curve, and I don‚Äôt quite have this site looking like I want it to (next step: get pop-up ads up and running!), but dangit, it‚Äôs good enough for now.

I plan on using this to post some updates about the software book I‚Äôm writing, plus other idears that pop into my noggin.

I hope you enjoy your stay at PeckYeah; por favor stay as long as you like üôá
entry.summary: After a year or so of YOLOing it with this website, and not using any framework, I‚Äôve taken the plunge and am gonna give Jekyll a shot.
